post_content:
Price includes shipping and insurance (within the US) and assume a no-fee payment method. If you'd like to use Paypal Goods and Services, that's fine, just add 3.5%. I have to collect sales tax from Washington state buyers.

$2250

I'm also open to trading this one.  I'd be looking for other HOFers with tough backs.
Great card, EPDG's are underrated. Nice example.
